body: Wow that's all I can say just wow
That boy is so damn adorable

Very good work, I've read the previous chapter of this work as well and I have to say, props to the author for this story he's made since I don't often see It In shota. I loved the twist of the half-vampire In this work fucking a cute vampire kid. The sex scenes were fantastic, best any author has done really, but I am sad to say that In the previous chapter and this one there has been a severe lack of blowjob scenes, so I must give a negative to this fine work on that point as a whole. The art style really Is fantastic as well since It has this softness and depth to, It really shows how laid back the author must be In real life and that shows In the work as well since It Is very relaxing thanks to this sort of an art style. Overall I rate It an 8.5/10. I would have given It a solid 9 or 10 If It had any blowjob/deepthroat scene.
